title: Remembering Altamonte: The Rolling Stones Concert That Went Awry
teaser: On this day back in 1969, the Rolling Stones held a free concert in Altamont, Calif., that quickly descended into a near-riot state. The Hell's Angels provided security and one concert-goer ended up dead.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
